title: Implement scheduled CRM refresh job runner for Salesforce/HubSpot (read-only sync)

sections.text: Build the backend scheduled job that executes the configured Salesforce/HubSpot refresh cadence defined in GOLD-79. The job should fetch in-scope objects/fields and persist/update the internal sync tables using a stored cursor/last-sync timestamp per workspace. Exclude dedupe and any write-back behavior in this ticket; the output should be reliable periodic ingestion with basic retries and per-run logging/metrics.
